sentences.en: Before Carver had demonstrated its possibilities , the peanut was scarcely grown in the region.
sentences.cn: 在他证实南方适合于种植花生之前,农户们是很少种植这种作物的.

sentences.en: Carver's efforts began to show results.
sentences.cn: 卡弗的努力开始有了成效.

sentences.en: He is learning the craft of a wood carver.
In his laboratory, with the simplest equipment, Carver discovered new ways for using plants.
sentences.cn: 卡弗在他的实验室里, 用最简陋的设备开发了农作物的新用途.

sentences.en: It also seemed that Carver could change almost any waste material into something useful.
sentences.cn: 卡弗似乎能把所有的废物都变成有用的东西.

sentences.en: It was in this work that Carver built his international fame as an outstanding agricultural chemist.
sentences.cn: 正因为此,卡弗以一位杰出的农业化学家的身份而闻名于世.

sentences.en: One of the most famous artists was the English carver Grinling Gibbons.
sentences.cn: 最著名的艺术家之一是英国的雕刻师格林林·吉本斯.

sentences.en: She read a poem by Carver which describes their life together.
sentences.cn: 她读了一首卡弗描写他们共同生活的诗。

sentences.en: So Carver decided that the school must go to the farmers.
sentences.cn: 因此卡弗认为必须要到农户中去办学.
这位雕刻师急忙转过身来.

sentences.en: The farm owner, Moses Carver, managed to have the baby rescued.
sentences.cn: 农场主摩西-卡弗设法救出了小卡弗.

sentences.en: The ivory industry employed about a thousand carvers.
sentences.cn: 象牙工业雇佣了大约一千个雕刻工。

sentences.en: Though he was sometimes ignored by white men, Carver was always a man of tolerance.
sentences.cn: 尽管卡弗有时仍会受到白人的歧视,他却总能做到心地宽容.

sentences.en: When he arrived, Carver found the Institute poor and lacking in equipment.
sentences.cn: 刚到学院, 卡弗就发现那儿贫穷不堪且缺乏设备.

sentences.en: While at Simpson College, Carver studied art and dreamed of becoming an artist.
sentences.cn: 在辛普森学院, 卡弗学的是艺术,他梦想成为一名艺术家.
